item.title: [Python] Probabilistic model mmvec to detect correlation between microbiome and metabolome
item.description: Article on the last day of the Metagenomic Advent Calendar. I'm sorry for just registering and posting... Introduction of how to use microbe–metabolite vectors, abbreviated mmvec, a method to detect the correlation between microbiome and metabolome. (Morton, et al. “Learning representations of microbe–metabolite interactions.” Nature Methods 16, 1306–1314 (2019)) As you can see from the fact that word2vec and word sense are aligned (?), it is a method of learning latent vectors expressing the relationship between paired microbiome and metabolome data sets.
